entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
